openpibo.modules.oled.spi module¶

Generic Linux SPI class using PureIO’s SPI class

SPI Class

mode = 0¶
readinto(buf, start=0, end=None, write_value=0)¶

Read data from SPI and into the buffer

set_no_cs()¶

Setting so that SPI doesn’t automatically set the CS pin

write(buf, start=0, end=None)¶

Write data from the buffer to SPI

write_readinto(buffer_out, buffer_in, out_start=0, out_end=None, in_start=0, in_end=None)¶

Perform a half-duplex write from buffer_out and then read data into buffer_in
